li.label: Elder Brain study progress
li.text: Investigation of the elder brain seems to indicate that is not inherently hostile and is somehow providing a slow stream of passive knowledge to the colony. It is almost as if it wants to help guide us.

li.label: Elder Brain study progress
li.text: You've learnt that the elder brain produces tadpoles inside its tank, they don't appear to grow any larger, nor do they appear to need any nutrition.

li.label: Elder Brain study progress
li.text: {PAWN_nameDef} has completed {PAWN_possessive} investigation of the elder brain. {PAWN_pronoun} has discovered that the tadpoles it produces desire to form a bond of some kind, reaching out psychically to entice people to get closer, promising power. The only step remaining is to extract a tadpole from the tank and let it bond with someone to find out what will happen, there's nothing else we can learn from simply observing the elder brain itself.
